issue.title: Executing hx_connect() from standalone computer running MATLAB R2014b API causes MATLAB to crash

content.raw: The latest release will not install. I've tried the online and offline methods for installing as instructed in the official release email. I have contacted Carlos Aguero to help troubleshoot the problem. He suggested trying a direct terminal command, which also failed to install.
content.html: The latest release will not install. I've tried the online and offline methods for installing as instructed in the official release email. I have contacted Carlos Aguero to help troubleshoot the problem. He suggested trying a direct terminal command, which also failed to install.
